name: The Nameless (DEMO)
description:
This a RPG game made with RPG Maker MV!

The game presents some souls-like elements, a platform component and a turn-based combat system based on combos!

The story is about a warrior without name and memories. His duty is to find the truth about his amnesia into a divine world divided in 8 levels. 

In this DEMO you can try 1 of these ones!

Enjoy and let me know what you think!
